content: For the fourth quarter of 2022, revenue from operations was $760 million compared to$684 million in the third quarter, a 10% improvement. Lower 48 drilling EBITDA rose by almost $33 million, a 37% improvement compared to the prior quarter, primarily related to sustained pricing increases. Drilling Solutions continued making significant strides by delivering EBITDA of $30.3 million in the fourth quarter, up 18% sequentially. For the fourth quarter, Rig Technologies generated EBITDA of $7.6 million, a 57% increase. For the full year 2022, Nabors generated free cash flow of $154 million, as we continued to deliver industry-leading results together with sustained cost and capital discipline.
